TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示安全性權杖提供者，這個提供者可處理 SOAP 訊息寄件者的安全性權杖。

span.span: Represents a security token provider that handles security tokens for a SOAP message sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在需要自訂安全性權杖的情況下使用 類別。Use the class when custom security tokens are required. 當 SOAP 訊息是由用戶端傳送而此時要使用安全性權杖來驗證該用戶端時，安全性權杖提供者的角色就是要負責取得此安全性權杖。The role of a security token provider is to get a security token when a SOAP message is sent by a client and a security token is used to authenticate the client or to protect the SOAP message. 具體地說，這時會呼叫 方法來取得安全性權杖。Specifically, the method is called to get a security token. 使用 和 方法來取消和更新安全性時，也可以呼叫安全性權杖提供者。The security token provider can also be called to cancel and renew a security using the and methods. 衍生自 類別的類別會實作 方法，判定指定之安全性權杖所需要的安全性權杖提供者。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to determine which security token provider is required for a given security token. 和 類別會提供內建安全性權杖型別的預設實作 (Implementation)。The and classes provide the default implementations for built-in security token types. 在自訂安全性權杖案例中，您必須從 、 或 其中一個類別衍生類別，並提供可以為自訂安全性權杖建立安全性權杖提供者、安全性權杖驗證程式和安全性權杖序列化程式的功能。For custom security token scenarios, you must derive a class from one of the , , or classes and provide the functionality to create the security token provider, security token authenticator, and security token serializer for the custom security token. 如需建立自訂權杖的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立自訂權杖](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md)。For more information about creating a custom token, see [How to: Create a Custom Token](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[SecurityTokenProvider#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/securitytokenprovider/cs/samlsecuritytokenprovider.cs#0)] [!code-vb[SecurityTokenProvider#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/securitytokenprovider/vb/samlsecuritytokenprovider.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected SecurityTokenProvider ();

Protected Sub New ()
protected: SecurityTokenProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，其中指定取消安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。

span.span: A that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.

param.name: token
param.span: 要取消的 。

span.span: The to cancel.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，這個委派會接收完成非同步關閉作業的通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，以便取消安全性權杖。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.

returns.span: ，這個物件會參考非同步取消作業。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous cancel operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可取消的安全性權杖 (例如，已核發的安全性權杖) 允許要求安全性權杖的用戶端在處理完成時取消它。A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.

span.para: 方法會呼叫方法。不需要在衍生類別中覆寫包含前置詞 Begin 和 End 的非同步方法。基底類別提供同步方法為基礎的非同步實作。

The method is called by the method. The asynchronous methods, which have a prefix of Begin and End, do not need to be overridden in derived classes. The base class provides an asynchronous implementation that is based on the synchronous methods.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您不需要非同步方法中，會覆寫為基底類別提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。因此，您不需要覆寫 方法，除非您需要提供自己的非同步實作。 方法會呼叫 方法。不需要在衍生類別中覆寫包含前置詞 Begin 和 End 的非同步方法。基底類別提供同步方法為基礎的非同步實作。

When you inherit from the class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods. Therefore, you are not required to override the method, unless you need to provide your own asynchronous implementation. The method is called by the method. The asynchronous methods, which have a prefix of Begin and End, do not need to be overridden in derived classes. The base class provides an asynchronous implementation that is based on the synchronous methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從 類別繼承時，因為 基底類別會提供以同步方法為基礎的非同步支援，所以您不需要覆寫非同步的方法。When you inherit from the class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods. 因此，除非您必須提供自己的非同步實作，否則不需要覆寫 方法。Therefore, you are not required to override the method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation. 方法會呼叫 方法。The method calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用戶端傳送 SOAP 訊息且需要安全性權杖時， 類別會呼叫 方法。The method is called by the class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required. 方法會呼叫 方法。The method calls the method. 在大多數情況下，`timeout` 的衍生類別 (例如 ) 不會使用 參數。In most cases the `timeout` parameter is not used by derived classes of such as . 不過，有時擷取安全性權杖包含分散式訊息。However, sometimes retrieving a security token involves distributed messaging. 其中一個範例是，聯合服務中會使用 。An example is used in a federated service. 在這種情況下，`timeout` 參數會用來避免因網路失敗、訊息遺失或其他錯誤狀況所造成的例外狀況。In these cases the `timeout` parameter is used to avoid exceptions caused by network failures, message loss, and other error conditions.

value.span: 如果可以取消安全性權杖，則為 ，否則為 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可取消的安全性權杖 (例如，已核發的安全性權杖) 允許要求安全性權杖的用戶端在處理完成時取消它。A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
